title: Clean Earth
creator: Created by Kristóf Kékesi
addNotAvailableDisclaimer: This feature is not available due to network or GPS issues.
countdowndisclaimer: You are way ahead of your time! Wait a bit and try again later.
anonymousmodedisclaimer: With anonymous mode you can use our services without using your real life name.
logindisclaimer: For legal reasons you have to identificate yourself.
logindisclaimertwo: For this you can use your Twitter account.
loginreminderdisclaimer: Without logging in the repost feature will be disabled for legal reasons.
pickupdisclaimer: This service will make a cleaning indicator for every user.
pickupdisclaimertwo: For your work we would like to share your name with the community.
reportdisclaimer: By reporting trash, a trash indicator will show up on the map for every user.
tooltipSigninwithgoogle: Sign in with your Google account
tooltipSigninwithtwitter: Sign in with your Twitter account
tooltipSigninwithfacebook: Sign in with your Facebook account
